itemDescription: British scientist, former Chief of BBSRC

wikipedia_page.main: Professor Raymond Baker  (born 1 November 1936) is a chemist and former Chief Executive of the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council.

response: * Raymond Baker (chemist), known as Ray. former CEO of the BBSRC
